properties.label: Username
properties.description: Provide the username (must have permissions to produce message to the topic)

properties.label: Password
properties.description: Provide a password for the user

properties.label: Bootstrap servers
properties.description: Provide bootstrap server(s), comma-delimited if there are multiple

properties.label: Topic
properties.description: Provide topic name

properties.label: Additional properties
properties.description: Provide additional Kafka producer properties in JSON

properties.label: Schema
properties.description: Avro inline schema for the message value

properties.label: Schema
properties.description: Schema (JSON or AVRO) for the message value

properties.label: Schema type
properties.description: Select the schema type. For details, visit the documentation

properties.label: Schema registry URL
properties.description: Provide the schema registry URL

properties.label: Key
properties.description: Provide message key

properties.label: Value
properties.description: Provide message value

properties.label: Headers
properties.description: Provide Kafka producer headers in JSON

properties.label: Version
properties.description: Version of the element template

properties.label: ID
properties.description: ID of the element template

properties.label: Result variable
properties.description: Name of variable to store the response in

properties.label: Result expression
properties.description: Expression to map the response into process variables

properties.label: Error expression
properties.description: Expression to handle errors. Details in the documentation.

properties.label: Retries
properties.description: Number of retries

properties.label: Retry backoff
properties.description: ISO-8601 duration to wait between retries
